00034                 public function index()
00035                 {
00036                         global $db;
00037                         if (!empty($_REQUEST['id']))
00038                         {
00039                                 $this->redirect_to(array('action' => 'read', 
00040                                 'id' => $_REQUEST['id']));
00041                         }
00042                         // A static class method would be infinitely better...
00043                         $article = new DiarioPost();
00044                         $this->articles = $article->find_all(array('where_clause' => "`status` = 'pubblicato'", 'order_by' => '`created_at` DESC', 'limit' => '10', 'start' => @$_REQUEST['start']));
00045                         
00046                         if (isset($_REQUEST['layout']) &&
00047                                 $_REQUEST['layout'] == 'false')
00048                         {
00049                                 $this->render(array('layout' => FALSE));
00050                         }

00068                 public function tag()
00069                 {
00070                         if (empty($_REQUEST['id']))
00071                         {
00072                                 $this->redirect_to(array('action' => 'index'));
00073                         }
00074                         // A static class method would be infinitely better...
00075                         $tag = new Tag();
00076                         $tag->find_by_id($_REQUEST['id']);
00077                         $tag->has_and_belongs_to_many('diario_posts', array('order_by' => '`created_at` DESC'));
00078                         $this->articles = $tag->diario_posts;
00079                         usort($this->articles, array($this->articles[0], 'sort_posts'));
00080                         
00081                         if (count($this->articles) > 10)
00082                         {
00083                                 $start = limit_3(@$_REQUEST['start'], 0, count($this->articles) - 1);
00084                                 $this->articles = array_slice($this->articles, $start, 10);
00085                         }
00086                         
00087                         $this->render(array('action' => 'index'));
00088                 }

00105                 public function date()
00106                 {
00107                         global $db;
00108                         
00109                         if (!empty($_REQUEST['day']))
00110                         {
00111                                 $the_time = mktime(0, 0, 0, $_REQUEST['month'], $_REQUEST['day'] + 1, $_REQUEST['year']);
00112                         }
00113                         else
00114                         {
00115                                 if (!empty($_REQUEST['month']))
00116                                 {
00117                                         $the_time = mktime(0, 0, 0, $_REQUEST['month'] + 1, 1, $_REQUEST['year']);
00118                                 }
00119                                 else
00120                                 {
00121                                         $the_time = mktime(0, 0, 0, 1, 1, $_REQUEST['year'] + 1);
00122                                 }
00123                         }
00124                         $the_date = date("Y-m-d H:i:s", $the_time);
00125                         $article = new DiarioPost();
00126                         $this->articles = $article->find_all(array('where_clause' => "`created_at` < '{$the_date}' AND `status` = 'pubblicato' ", 'order_by' => '`created_at` DESC', 'limit' => '10', 'start' => @$_REQUEST['start']));
00127                         
00128                         if (isset($_REQUEST['layout']) &&
00129                                 $_REQUEST['layout'] == 'false')
00130                         {
00131                                 $this->render(array('layout' => FALSE, 'action' => 'index'));
00132                         }
00133                         else
00134                         {
00135                                 $this->render(array('action' => 'index'));
00136                         }
00137                 }

00144                 public function live_search()
00145                 {
00146                         if (isset($_REQUEST['term']) && !empty($_REQUEST['term']))
00147                         {
00148                                 global $db;
00149                                 
00150                                 $post_factory = new DiarioPost();
00151                                 
00152                                 $terms = explode(' ', $_REQUEST['term']);
00153                                 
00154                                 $where_clause = '1';
00155                                 for ($i = 0; $i < count($terms); $i++)
00156                                 {
00157                                         $where_clause .= " AND (`title` LIKE '%{$db->escape($terms[$i])}%' OR " .
00158                                                 "`author` LIKE '%{$db->escape($terms[$i])}%' OR " .
00159                                                 "`text` LIKE '%{$db->escape($terms[$i])}%') ";
00160                                 }
00161                                 
00162                                 $this->search_results = $post_factory->find_by_query("SELECT * " .
00163                                         "FROM `diario_posts` " .
00164                                         "WHERE {$where_clause} " .
00165                                         "AND `status` = 'pubblicato' LIMIT 20");
00166                                 if (count($this->search_results) > 0)
00167                                 {
00168                                         $this->render(array('layout' => FALSE));
00169                                 }
00170                         }
00171                         $this->render(array('action' => 'no_results', 'layout' => FALSE));
00172                 }
00173

00190                                 {
00191                                         $where_clause .= " AND (`title` LIKE '%{$db->escape($terms[$i])}%' OR " .
00192                                                 "`author` LIKE '%{$db->escape($terms[$i])}%' OR " .
00193                                                 "`text` LIKE '%{$db->escape($terms[$i])}%') ";
00194                                 }
00195                                 
00196                                 $this->articles = $post_factory->find_by_query("SELECT * " .
00197                                         "FROM `diario_posts` " .
00198                                         "WHERE {$where_clause} " .
00199                                         "AND `status` = 'pubblicato' LIMIT 20");
00200                                 if (count($this->articles) < 1)
00201                                 {
00202                                         $this->redirect_to(array('action' => 'index'));
00203                                 }
00204                                 $this->render(array('action' => 'index'));
00205                         }
00206                         else
00207                         {
00208                                 $this->redirect_to(array('action' => 'index'));

00216                 public function read()
00217                 {
00218                         if (empty($_REQUEST['id']))
00219                         {
00220                                 $this->redirect_to(array('action' => 'index'));
00221                         }
00222                         /*
00223                         // THIS SUCKS!!!
00224                         $this->article = DiarioPost::find($_REQUEST['id'], 'DiarioPost');
00225                         */
00226                         $this->article = new DiarioPost();
00227                         $this->article->find_by_id($_REQUEST['id']);
00228                         if (!$this->article->text)
00229                         {
00230                                 $this->redirect_to(array('action' => 'index'));
00231                         }
00232                         if ($this->article->status != 'pubblicato')
00233                         {
00234                                 HTTP::error(404);
00235                         }
00236                         
00237                         // Annotates that the article has been read
00238                         $this->article->readings++;
00239                         $this->article->save();
00240                 }

00261                 public function post_comment()
00262                 {
00263                         if (!$this->request->is_post())
00264                         {
00265                                 $this->redirect_to(array('action' => 'index'));
00266                         }
00267                         if (!Antispam::check_math())
00268                         {
00269                                 $this->flash(Antispam::random_comment(), 'error');
00270                                 $this->redirect_to(array('action' => 'index', 'id' => $_POST['post_id']));
00271                         }
00272                         // A static class method would be infinitely better...
00273                         $comment = new DiarioComment($_POST);
00274                         $comment->created_at = date("Y-m-d H:i:s");
00275                         $comment->save();
00276                         
00277                         if (isset($_POST['remember_me']))
00278                         {
00279                                 Cookie::set('name', $_POST['author'], Time::next_year());
00280                                 Cookie::set('email', $_POST['email'], Time::next_year());
00281                                 Cookie::set('URL', $_POST['URL'], Time::next_year());
00282                         }
00283                         
00284                         // Expires the cache
00285                         $this->expire_cached_page(array('action' => 'index'));
00286                         $this->expire_cached_page(array('action' => 'read', 'id' => $_POST['post_id']));
00287                         // Expires the cache of Comments feed
00288                         $this->expire_cached_page(array('controller' => 'feed', 'action' => 'diario_comments', 'id' => $_POST['post_id']));
00289                         
00290                         $this->redirect_to(array('action' => 'read', 'id' => $_POST['post_id'], 'hash' => "comment-{$comment->id}"));
00291                 }

00298                 {
00299                         Antispam::init_math_test();

00306                 protected function highlight_words()
00307                 {
00308                         if (isset($_REQUEST['term']) && !empty($_REQUEST['term']))
00309                         {
00310                                 if (($pos = strpos($this->response->body, '<body')) !== FALSE)
00311                                 {
00312                                         $head = substr($this->response->body, 0, $pos);
00313                                         $tail = substr($this->response->body, $pos);
00314                                         
00315                                         $tail = preg_replace(
00316                                                 "/>([^<]*)({$_REQUEST['term']})/ie",
00317                                                 "'>\\1'.span('\\2',array('class'=>'highlighted'))",
00318                                                 $tail);
00319                                         
00320                                         $this->response->body = $head . $tail;
00321 
00322                                 }
00323                         }
00324                 }
00325         }
